workExperience.heading: Operations Intern at Samsara
workExperience.description: Created a new pricing system for all US/Canadian hardware shipments, saving 200 hours annually.
workExperience.title: Operations Intern

workExperience.heading: Project Management Intern at Starbucks
workExperience.description: Created an interactive calendar app displaying business rhythms across a 450-person shared services organization.
workExperience.title: Project Management Intern

workExperience.heading: Project Management Intern at Fiveable
workExperience.description:
Led a user education initiative that increased participation in a cohort-based program by 25%.

Managed/triaged product feedback + bug reports and conducted user acceptance testing for six features.
workExperience.title: Project Management Intern

workExperience.heading: Leadership Development Intern at Foster School of Business
workExperience.description: Drove user-feedback-based changes to the department's leadership certificate, increasing the completion rate by 50%.
workExperience.title: Leadership Development Intern

volunteering.heading: Senior VP at Delta Sigma Pi
volunteering.description: Led recruiting efforts for DSP, a professional fraternity facilitating professional development & community building.
volunteering.title: Senior VP

volunteering.heading: Founding Member at UW PM Association
volunteering.description: Creating community around students interested in careers within product, program, and project management.
volunteering.title: Founding Member

volunteering.heading: VP at Husky Run Club
volunteering.description: Raised $9000 for UW's recreational distance running club. Also managed spending/fundraising, and record-keeping.
volunteering.title: VP
